title: nambittAn irukkinrEn
sahitya:
nambittAn irukkinrEn ennappanE jnAna naTarAjanE unnaruLaiyE


anupallavi

  ambalattADum arashE un perumaiyai allum paghalum anbAi sholli sholli urugi


caraNam    Anava mAya vinai arugi manak-kal urugi mANikkavAcakar pOL
 un mangaLa jyOtiyil maraindu karaindu pOgha
